effect.Name: Subtraction With Power
effect.description: Subtraction With Power - Shader subtracts base and blend colors from each other then colors are calculated by power
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Subtraction With Power (Background) Shader | 1.1 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Shader subtracts base and blend colors from each other then colors are calculated by power

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of background visibility

parameter.name: Power
parameter.description: This variable sets the color power
